    • Method Detail

      • getField

        public static <T> java.lang.reflect.Field getField(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                   java.lang.String fieldName)
        This method returns the specific field of input class. If no field is found, an attempt to get the field through the AliasNames annotation is done.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class you're searching the field into.
        fieldName - The field you're searching for.
        Returns:
        The Field found. If no result is found, null is returned.
        See Also:
        AliasNames}

      • getAllFields

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.reflect.Field> getAllFields(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        This method returns all fields from given class, private and public ones.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class you should inspect.
        Returns:
        A Set of Fields of the given class.

      • getGenericType

        public static <TYPE> java.lang.Class<TYPE> getGenericType(java.lang.reflect.Type input)
        This method returns the generic class of an input Type with generics. In case of extension, the superclass Type is returned.
        Parameters:
        input - The type you're trying to get the class of.
        Returns:
        the Class of the given Type. If no generic type is defined, null is returned.
